caption.p: Scanning electron micrographs (secondary electron images taken at 10Â kV) of microbial matts on the panel surfaces at ( a) Leang Balang Pakalu 5; ( b) Leang Timpuseng; ( c) Leang Balang Pakalu 5; ( d) Leang Timpuseng; ( e) Leang Lompoa; and ( f) a typical gypsum rosette crystal structure, also from Leang Lompoa.
